member.name: T:Waterfurnace.ZebraPrint.SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES
member.summary: Structure for CreateFile. Used only to fill requirement

member.name: M:Waterfurnace.ZebraPrint.StartWrite(System.String)
member.summary: This function must be called first. Printer path must be a COM Port or a UNC path.

member.name: M:Waterfurnace.ZebraPrint.Write(System.String)
member.summary: This will write a command to the printer.

member.name: M:Waterfurnace.ZebraPrint.EndWrite
member.summary: This function must be called after writing to the zebra printer.

member.name: T:Waterfurnace.ZebraPrint
member.summary:
This class can print zebra labels to either a network share, LPT, or COM port.
Programmer: Rick Chronister
member.remarks: Only tested for network share, but in theory works for LPT and COM.
